turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great, thanks for asking, how can I help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm trying to place an order at Starbucks at Peninsular Place in Houston, Texas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and what would you like to drink?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm thinking of going with an iced cappuccino with cold foam.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: So that's a venti 2% iced cappuccino with cold foam on top from the starbucks on penn's oil place.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your drink is all set and will be ready for pickup in 15 minutes, the reciept will arrive via mobile.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Alright. Thank you. I'll look for it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem, have a good one.
